scripts.build: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat compile
scripts.size:contract: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat size-contracts --no-compile
scripts.test: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat test
scripts.remove:console: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat remove-logs
scripts.node:hardhat: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat node --network hardhat --export ./deployments/hardhat.json
scripts.console:hardhat: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat --network localhost console
scripts.deploy:hardhat: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat deploy --network hardhat --watch --export ./deployments/hardhat.json
scripts.deploy:mumbai: export $(cat env/.mumbai.env | xargs) && npx hardhat deploy --network mumbai --export ./deployments/mumbai.json
scripts.deploy:polygon: export $(cat env/.polygon.env | xargs) && npx hardhat deploy --network polygon --export ./deployments/polygon.json
scripts.run:hardhat: export $(cat env/.hardhat.env | xargs) && npx hardhat run --network localhost
